title: CoreSpring Evaluate an Equation Question Schema

componentType.description: A required value to indicate the component type. For evaluate equation, this must be 'corespring-function-entry'.

correctResponse.description: An object describing the correct responses for the component.

equation.description: The correct equation response for the component.

feedback.description: Describes feedback which should be presented to the user when the component is submitted.

correctFeedback.description: A feedback string that will be shown for a correct response if correctFeedbackType is set to 'custom'.

correctFeedbackType.description: Describes the type of feedback that will be shown if all of the correct choices are entered.

incorrectFeedback.description: A feedback string that will be shown for a incorrect response if incorrectFeedbackType is set to 'custom'.

incorrectFeedbackType.description: Describes the type of feedback that will be shown if no correct choices are entered.

ignoreSpacing.description: If true, ignore whitespace in matching the response.

showFormattingHelp.description: If true, display the formatting help tooltip to the user.

title.description: A title for the interaction, displayed in the editor.
